Text: Awesome Quality!! not for the big screen, but good enough for my computer and amazing on my ipod touch. the subs are a bit off, but they're in english, so its good. NOTE: I would HIGHLY recommend seeing this in 3d in the theater first. it changed my life. I'm downloading so i can see it for the 3rd time. AWESOME MOVIE!!!
Tanks uploader. Eng subs over other subs, not bad though. Otherwise watchable on standard screen. Best yet posted.
